amendment.description: To include the statutorily required PAYGO language.

vote.text: Amendment SA 783 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 783 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Rockefeller. (consideration: CR S6616; text: CR S6616) To include the statutorily required PAYGO language.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 783 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Rockefeller.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 783 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
